title: Calories in a Flank Steak
meta_description: Discover calories in a flank steak (typical 6 oz serving), including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.

quick_answer.text: A 6 oz cooked flank steak provides ~330 kcal and ~47 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories in a flank steak per 100 g?
faqs.a: About 194 kcal per 100 g of cooked, lean flank steak.
